verses.1: Israel mite bangin a lungsim a siangtho a thutang mite tungah Pasian hoih takpi hi.
verses.2: Ahih hangin kei ka hih leh ka khe kisui puk dektak a, ka khe taal dektak hi.
verses.3: Bang hang hiam cih leh migiloteʼ daupaina ka muh ciangin mi kihisakte ka eng hi.
verses.4: Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in nat velvalna bangmah thuak lo uh a, a pumpi uh cidamin zol hilhial hi.
verses.5: Amaute in midangte bangin haksatna thuak lo uh a, amaute in midangte bangin gimna ngah lo uh hi.
verses.6: Tua ahih ciangin amaute in khainiang bangin kiphatsakna ok uh a, puan bangin ngongtatna silh uh hi.
verses.7: A lungsim panun gitlohna pusuaksak uh a, a ngaihsutna uh gitlohna tawh a dim let hi.
verses.8: Amaute in mi thusim loin el pau uh a, kiliatsakna tawh a sucip dingin mi a tawng uh hi.
verses.9: Amauteʼ gensiatna in vantung dong ban to a, kiliatsakna tawh leitungah thu gen kawikawi uh hi.
verses.10: Tua ahih ciangin mite in amaute phat uh a, amauʼ mawhna zong lo uh hi.
verses.11: Amaute in, “Pasian in bangci theih ding ahi hiam? Sangpen pa in phawk ding ahi hiam?” ci uh hi.
verses.12: Amaute migilo ahi uh hi. A tawntungin nuam takin om hithiat uh a, amaute a hauhna uh khang semsem zaw lai hi.
verses.13: Ka lungsim siangsak a, mawhna ka bawl loh hangin a phattuamna om tuan lo hi.
verses.14: Bang hang hiam cih leh sun thapai-in gimna ka thuak a, zingsang simin hong kithuhilh hi.
verses.15: Tu-a bangin thu a gen hi leng, nangma mite tungah a thutak lo ka suak ding hi.
verses.16: Ahih hangin hih thu a bangci hiam, ci-in ka ngaihsut ciangin kei adingin a lunggimhuai mahmah nasep khat hong suak a,
verses.17: Pasianʼ biakinn sungah ka pai ciangin a thutawpna dongte ka tel hi.
verses.18: Nangmah in amaute mun nalna ah na koih takpi dinga, a sia dingin amaute na tuksak ding hi.
verses.19: Tomno sungin amaute kisusia-in, lau mahmahna in amaute nil khia mang ding hi.
verses.20: Amaute pen zan a mangmat tawh kibang lel a, na khanlawh ciangin amaute a bangci pian hiam, ci-in na phawk nawn kei hi.
verses.21: Ka lung khamin ka lungsim hong nat ciangin,
verses.22: keimah hai-in bangmah ka thei kei a, nangma mai ah ganhing tawh ka kibang hi.
verses.23: Ahih hangin nangmah tawh ka om khawm ngitnget a, ka khut tak lamin kei na hong len hi.
verses.24: Thulahna tawh keimah nong makaih a, a nung ciangin minthanna munah na hong tunpih ding hi.
verses.25: Nang sim loh vantungah kua nei ka hi hiam? Nang sim loh ka deih ding leitungah kuamah om lo hi.
verses.26: Ka lungsim le ka pumpi zawngkhal kha dinga, ahih hangin Pasian pen ka lungsim hatna le keima aʼ hi tawntung ding hi.
verses.27: Bang hang hiam cih leh nang tawh a kigamlate kisia ding uh a, nangma tungah a hong khialte na beisak ding hi.
verses.28: Ahih hangin kei adingin Pasianʼ kiangah om ding a hoih ahi hi. Na sepnate khempeuh ka gen theih nadingin Topa Pasian kong bel hi.
